message: I'm being generous, but you know the rules, Bob.  Accept this and we both get something.  Reject and we both could end up with nothing.
I'm taking a chance, but I believe a fairer split is possible. Let's see if we can work something out.
This is my final offer. I'm willing to compromise, but  I'm not going any lower. It's in your best interest to accept, as the next round could be worse for both of us.
